ygData.subject: FW: reason for that email
ygData.msgSnippet: You mean like this? ... From: Nick [mailto:brutalny@concentric.net] Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 8:32 PM To: EQCheats@onelist.com Subject: [EQCheats]
ygData.messageBody:
You mean like this?

-----Original Message-----
From: Nick [mailto:brutalny@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 8:32 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] reason for that email


From: "Nick" <brutalny@...>

I'm sorry if that email bothered any of you, but I did it because a person
on this list (the one named in that email) decided to pick up my email
address and spam me with long emails over and over. It was a warning to
please not take my email address from this list and spam me.
